name: Winter Challenge
summary:
Winter Olympiad is probably the best collection of Winter sporting games ever written. FIVE exciting games with outstanding graphics and exhilarating game play make Winter Olympiad a must for your collection. 
 
FIVE GREAT GAMES: 
 
-SKI JUMPING 
-BOB SLEIGH 
-BIATHLON 
-SLALOM 
-DOWNHILL RACING
